# PHP7内核剖析

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/php7-neihe-pouxi
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/php7-neihe-pouxi
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install php7-neihe-pouxi
php7-neihe-pouxi <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g php7-neihe-pouxi
php7-neihe-pouxi <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
